entry.source: I would like to find some Samurai to slay{F801}{F804,5}four demons{F804,0} for us. This is for a ritual so{F801}that we may create a herald. If we succeed,{F801}then our victory in the next battle will be{F801}assured. If you accept, please meet me on the{F801}{F804,5}path to Shene Duque{F804,0} for more details.{F801}
entry.target: I would like to find some Samurai to slay{F801}{F804,5}four demons{F804,0} for us. This is for a ritual so{F801}that we may create a herald. If we succeed,{F801}then our victory in the next battle will be{F801}assured. If you accept, please meet me on the{F801}{F804,5}path to Shene Duque{F804,0} for more details.{F801}

entry.source: The four demons to be slain are in various{F801}parts of {F804,5}Tokyo.{F804,0} The first resides in {F804,5}Nakano,{F804,0}{F801}another in {F804,5}Ryogoku,{F804,0} the third in {F804,5}Shiba,{F804,0} and{F801}the last can be found in {F804,5}Komagome.{F804,0} Head for{F801}the underground, Samurai, and hasten the{F801}completion of the ritual.{F801}
